title: Akadema Releases Glove Deal for Sale Only on Amazon
text:
Akadema Releases Glove Deal for Sale Only on Amazon
Akadema is releasing their steerhide leather gloves to be sold only on Amazon.
Hawthorne, NJ, October 22, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Akadema is releasing the rest of their Prodigy series, steerhide leather gloves to be sold exclusively on Amazon. Akadema and Amazon have been doing business together for many years. “Being able to work with one of the largest e-tailers in the world (Amazon) we expect big sales from these gloves,” said President Lawrence Gilligan. The gloves come in a soft brown color with a black B-hive webbing and tan lacing. The leather is easy to break in and is very comfortable on the hand. These gloves are perfect for any age, at any level for infield and outfield use. The gloves are available in 12.50”, 12”, and 11.50”. Glove comes in right hand, and left hand throw and is available only on Amazon.
About Akadema: Akadema is the world’s most exciting baseball and softball equipment company. In its short history Akadema has become the hottest baseball and softball equipment company for professional, college, high school and serious youth players. Akadema attributes their increase in market share to their innovative quality professional product line, which is contrast to mass production products that have little to do with quality or feel. Akadema has long stood for high quality and performance and wants you to Bring Your "A" Game. Akadema comes highly endorsed by MLB players like: Manny Ramirez, Shane Victorino, Cameron Maybin, Derek Holland, Ross Ohlendorf, Vin Mazzaro, Brad Ziegler, Craig Breslow, David Murphy, Brandon McCarthy, Jose Guillen and many others as well as Senior Advisors and MLB Hall of Famers Gary Carter and Carl Yastrzemski.
